action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson of Ohio introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to require payment to counties of a portion of certain revenues received by the United States under Federal oil and gas leases, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Providing Opportunity With Energy Revenues in Counties Act or the POWER Counties Act.

section.header: Payment to counties of portion of certain revenues received by the United States under Federal oil and gas leases
